name: TreasureIslandOldiesRockandRollNews
0:
”Alexa, open Treasure Island Oldies”
”Alexa, start Treasure Island Oldies”
”Alexa, ask Treasure Island Oldies”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: treasure island oldies
Developer Terms of Use
des:
A weekly Podcast that covers events that took place this week in Rock & Roll History; who was in the studio recording what would become a big hit, and spotlight artists that are celebrating birthdays this week. Join me for the entire weekly four hour radio show, Treasure Island Oldies, The Home of Lost Treasures at www.treasureislandoldies.com. On the air every week since 1997,

Here are a few quick tips when navigating our skill. The First thing to note, when opening the skill you’ll be playing the latest episode, but if that’s not what you’re looking for, you can always find something more specific. This skill allows you to play next or previous episode. In addition, you can ask the skill to play the newest or oldest episodes or if you want to get specific, play a specific episode by saying the episode number. Try some of these commands:

**Next/Previous Episode**
— [While Episode Is Playing] = “Alexa, next”
— [While Episode Is Playing] = “Alexa, previous”

**Select Latest Episode**
— “Alexa, ask Treasure Island Oldies Rock and Roll News to play latest episode” 

**Select First Episode**
— “Alexa, ask Treasure Island Oldies Rock and Roll News to start from first episode”
